content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Boxing divisional rankings: Does Danny Garcia return after KO win?
content: Former champion Danny Garcia scored a fourth-round KO win in his final fight in Brooklyn. Here are the latest ESPN rankings in all weight classes.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea to go back in for Spain striker Samu
content: Chelsea will make a fresh attempt to sign FC Porto's Spain international striker Samu Agehowa. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Bihar polls: AIMIM fields non-Muslim candidates; Owaisi's strategy explained in 3 points
content: AIMIM has released its first list of 25 candidates for the Bihar assembly elections, notably including two non-Muslim nominees. This move signifies Asaduddin Owaisi's strategy to broaden the party's appeal beyond its traditional Muslim base and position it as a social justice platform for all communities, aiming to contest beyond the Seemanchal region.

title: Delhi breathes worst Diwali air in 4 years! Tuesday winds prevent ‚Äòsevere‚Äô drop
content: Delhi's air quality plunged into the 'very poor' category on Diwali night as firecracker violations surged, pushing PM2.5 levels to their highest since 2021. Despite a temporary spike, rising winds and warmer temperatures prevented a prolonged severe episode. Authorities are monitoring the situation, with Stage III of GRAP not yet invoked.

title: Xi's purge: Bosses are disappearing in China - at alarming rate
content: Powerful figures in China are disappearing at an alarming rate. Top generals and CEOs are being detained or purged. This trend spans both the military and corporate elite. These crackdowns reflect a new phase in Xi Jinping's rule. Fear and obedience are being enforced across economic and military power centers. The scale of these purges is staggering.

title: Bad omen? Trump-Putin meet in Budapest on hold; Rubio calls Lavrov
content: A US official announced no immediate plans for a meeting between Presidents Trump and Putin, following a call between Secretary Rubio and Foreign Minister Lavrov. The Kremlin also confirmed no precise timeframe for a summit. This comes after Trump previously suggested a meeting in Budapest within two weeks.

title: OpenAI takes its 'Google fight' to next level; launches AI-powered browser, ChatGPT Atlas
content: OpenAI has introduced ChatGPT Atlas, a new AI-powered web browser. This browser integrates OpenAI's chatbot directly into the browsing experience. Users can interact with the AI assistant without switching tabs. Key features include a ChatGPT sidebar for real-time assistance and browser memories for context retention. Agent mode allows the AI to perform tasks autonomously.

title: Charges against Sonam Wangchuk ‚Äòflimsy, childish, baseless‚Äô: Wife
content: Wife of jailed climate activist Sonam Wangchuk submitted a representation calling charges against him "flimsy and baseless." She stated that videos cited by authorities were taken out of context and misinterpreted, arguing his arrest aims to silence peaceful advocacy for Ladakh's statehood and democratic rights.

title: 'Sudarshan' S-400: India, Russia discussing Rs 10K cr missiles deal; why it matters
content: India is set to acquire approximately Rs 10,000 crore worth of missiles for its S-400 air defence system, bolstering its capabilities after its reported success in Operation Sindoor. Discussions are underway with Russia to enhance long-range strike and interception, with the Defence Acquisition Council expected to review the proposal soon.

title: Naqvi to India: 'Bring your captain and receive Asia Cup trophy from me'
content: The ACC chairman has proposed a Dubai ceremony on November 10 for India to receive the Asia Cup trophy, following the team's refusal to accept it from him after their win. This comes after a series of exchanges between the ACC and BCCI, with India having a perfect record against Pakistan in the tournament.

title: What Sean Duffy said on SpaceX that made Musk so angry
content: Elon Musk publicly criticized acting NASA administrator Sean Duffy after Duffy stated SpaceX was behind schedule on the Artemis III lunar landing system. Musk questioned Duffy's intelligence and leadership, suggesting he was "trying to kill NASA!" Duffy's comments indicated NASA might consider other contractors like Blue Origin for future lunar missions.

title: Indian students rethink US visit: Visa woes, job fears on worry list
content: Indian student enrolment in the US has plunged sharply in 2025 amid stricter visa rules, soaring costs, and safety concerns. With F-1 visa limits, a $100,000 H-1B fee, and growing rejection rates, many are turning to Canada, the UK, and Europe instead. Experts warn the downturn could cost US universities billions and disrupt global talent pipelines.

title: 'No American boots on ground in Gaza': JD Vance in Israel
content: US Vice President JD Vance affirmed that American troops will not be deployed to Gaza, reinforcing President Trump's pledge. Vance's visit to Israel aims to bolster the Gaza ceasefire, amid concerns that Prime Minister Netanyahu might abandon the truce. Trump urged Middle Eastern allies to intervene against Hamas if the peace deal collapses, warning of severe consequences.

title: Economic warning: JPMorgan CEO urges action; Says US too dependent on unreliable sources
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon is launching a $1.5 trillion, decade-long plan to bolster America's industrial strength and reduce foreign supply chain reliance.  The Security and Resiliency Initiative will target defense, frontier tech, energy, and advanced manufacturing, with the bank committing $10 billion to kickstart these vital sectors. Dimon urges immediate, unified action to secure the nation's future.

title: World Cup: Rain fails to save Pakistan; South Africa seal 150-run victory
content: South Africa thrashed Pakistan by 150 runs in a rain-shortened World Cup encounter, propelling them to the top of the standings. Laura Wolvaardt's 90 and contributions from Sune Luus and Marizanne Kapp powered South Africa to 312. Pakistan faltered under a revised target, collapsing to 83 for seven, with Kapp starring with the ball.

title: Diwali diplomacy: Indian, Chinese soldiers trade sweets along LAC
content: Indian and Chinese soldiers shared sweets across the Line of Actual Control on Diwali. This gesture of goodwill was confirmed by the Chinese Embassy. The exchange occurs as India-China relations show improvement. Prime Minister Narendra Modi met President Xi Jinping at the SCO summit. India did not exchange sweets with Pakistan this year due to ongoing tensions.

title: Chennai drenched: Schools closed in seven districts; IMD issues warning
content: Chengalpet, Tiruvallur, Cuddalore, Thanjavur, Tiruvarur and Mayiladuthurai district collectors declared a holiday for schools and colleges on Wednesday.

title: Conor McGregor & Dee Devlin Net Worth 2025: Inside their Irish empire of love & business
content: Conor McGregor, a renowned UFC fighter, has built a significant financial empire beyond his fighting career. His success is amplified by his partner, Dee Devlin, who manages his business operations. Together, this Irish power couple has transformed fame into a lasting business legacy, demonstrating the strength of teamwork and shared ambition.

title: Lamar Jackson injury update: Ravens QB misses practice
content: Lamar Jackson's hamstring injury continues to sideline the Baltimore Ravens quarterback, raising doubts about his availability for Sunday's crucial game against the Chicago Bears. Missing the past two games and Monday's practice, Jackson's return is vital for the 1-5 Ravens to salvage their disappointing 2025 season and playoff hopes.

title: Mitch Marner sparks Vegas shakeup: Confident comment after first goals
content: Mitch Marner's two-goal outburst against the Calgary Flames has revitalized the Vegas Golden Knights, propelling them to the top of the Pacific Division.  His return to form, coupled with a perfect power play performance, signals a strong start to his debut season in Vegas, promising exciting times ahead for the team and its fans.

title: Doug Martin death: Former NFL RB found unresponsive in police custody
content: Former Tampa Bay Buccaneers star Doug Martin has died at 36. Police say he was involved in a home break-in in Oakland, California. A struggle with officers ensued, and Martin became unresponsive. His family states he was experiencing a mental health crisis and seeking help. Martin was a Pro Bowl running back known for his explosive rookie season.

title: Chess: Historic! 10-year-old Indian-origin British chess prodigy beats ex-world champ
content: Ten-year-old British chess prodigy Bodhana Sivanandan achieved a historic victory, defeating former World Champion Grandmaster Mariya Muzychuk at the European Club Cup. This remarkable win, achieved while representing the She Plays to Win Lionesses, highlights Sivanandan's rapid ascent in the chess world. She continues to break records, solidifying her position as a rising star in English chess.

title: Deal with Australia and $150bn ‚Äòmeaty project‚Äô: How Trump is countering Xi on rare earths - will it work?
content: The US is partnering with Australia to boost rare earth production, aiming to reduce reliance on China. A $8.5 billion agreement will fund joint projects and a gallium refinery. The administration is also seeking private capital for a $150 billion Army infrastructure overhaul, highlighting a broader embrace of private investment to secure critical mineral supply chains.

title: Bihar polls: Why Nitish, Tejashwi still call the shots; can Kishor break two-front curse?
content: Bihar's political landscape, dominated by RJD, JD(U), and BJP, sees smaller parties struggling to form a cohesive third front. Nitish Kumar's shifting alliances and Tejashwi Yadav's RJD face challenges, while Prashant Kishor's Jan Suraaj emerges as a potential disruptor, aiming to reshape the state's electoral dynamics beyond traditional power blocs.

title: Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh introduce daughter Dua to the world on Diwali
content: After months of keeping their daughter away from the public eye, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh finally introduced their baby girl, Dua, to the world on the occasion of Diwali. The couple, who welcomed their first child in September 2024, had earlier requested paparazzi to respect their daughter‚Äôs privacy ‚Äî but this festive season, they decided to share a glimpse of their family joy.

title: Days before his death, Daniel Naroditsky posted video with shocking title
content: American chess grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky has died at age 29, with the cause undisclosed. Known for his talent as a player, commentator, and educator, Naroditsky's passing has prompted questions and discussions within the chess community. His family remembered him for his passion and the joy he brought to the game.

title: Proxy war? Kabul sets record straight with Pak; rejects India's role in conflict
content: Afghanistan's defence minister Mullah Yaqoob denies India's role in recent clashes with Pakistan.  Pakistan had accused India of backing the Taliban. India, however, states Pakistan blames neighbors for its failures.  India has reopened its embassy in Kabul, strengthening ties with Afghanistan.  This move signifies a growing diplomatic and economic relationship between the two nations.

title: 'Gazab aadmi hai': Nitish's awkward garland moment goes viral; Tejashwi mocks CM
content: Tejashwi Yadav has questioned Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's fitness to lead, sharing a video of the CM struggling at a rally. Yadav also alleged Nitish's party might have deliberately incapacitated him. This renewed criticism comes as Assembly elections loom, with Yadav suggesting Nitish's behavior raises governance concerns.

title: 'Dated this obese woman': Decoding India hate in Young Republicans chat
content: ‚ÄãDuring the election, fewer Indian-Americans voted for Harris than they did for Democratic candidates like Biden, Clinton, or Obama. Even after the election, it appeared Indians were everywhere and integral to the Republican machine. Tulsi Gabbard, an honorary Indian, was now Director of National Intelligence. Sriram Krishnan was advising Trump on AI. Kash Patel was the FBI chief. But all of it appeared to be just veneer, and the contempt for the community continued unabated ‚Äî as evident during the MAGA Civil War, when the faithful attacked H-1B visa holders (mostly Indian-Americans) for Americans losing their jobs.

title: Kick streamer Sam Pepper banned for injuring 8-year-old with firecracker
content: British streamer Sam Pepper is facing backlash after a Diwali fireworks incident in New Delhi allegedly injured a young girl. While live-streaming, Pepper fired a firework towards a group, reportedly hitting a girl and causing a cut above her eyebrow. He has since admitted fault, covered medical costs, and been suspended from Kick.

title: 'Our blessings have arrived': Harrdy Sandhu welcomes second child with wife Zenith Sidhu; fans shower love
content: Singer-actor Harrdy Sandhu and his wife Zenith Sandhu have welcomed their second child. The newborn arrived during the Diwali festivities, bringing double the joy to the family. Sandhu shared a heartwarming picture of the baby's tiny hands alongside those of the parents and their elder son, announcing the happy occasion.

title: Bihar polls: Friendly fights or frayed ties? MGB's unity faces reality check
content: Bihar's Mahagathbandhan alliance is experiencing internal friction. Seat-sharing issues are causing confusion and overlapping nominations for the upcoming 2025 assembly elections. Smaller allies feel sidelined, with JMM withdrawing from the state-level arrangement. These coordination challenges could impact vote splits in key constituencies. Leaders are working to resolve disputes before polling begins.

title: Watch: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi spotted bursting crackers on Diwali
content: Vaibhav Suryavanshi, a 14-year-old cricket star, celebrated Diwali with fans after Bihar's Ranji Trophy victory. The young player, who also secured an IPL contract, is seen as a key figure in Bihar's cricket revival. Suryavanshi is expected to play in the upcoming ICC Under-19 World Cup. He is enjoying his moments off the field.

title: Riding high: Lokpal floats tender for 7 luxury BMWs; request sparks outrage online
content: India‚Äôs top anti-corruption body, the Lokpal, has come under fire after issuing a tender to purchase seven luxury BMWs, sparking allegations of hypocrisy and misuse of taxpayers‚Äô money. Opposition leaders, activists, and social media users criticised the move, highlighting the irony of an institution created to fight corruption indulging in lavish spending.

title: Bihar polls: Mahua to Raghopur ‚Äî top 5 high-profile seats to watch out for
content: Bihar's 2025 assembly elections are set for a high-stakes contest on November 6 and 11. Key constituencies like Raghopur and Mahua will witness intense battles, including family strongholds and 'friendly fights' between INDIA bloc partners, highlighting the RJD-Congress vs. BJP-JD(U) rivalry.

title: Oklahoma City Thunder vs Houston Rockets: Preview, lineup, prediction & where to watch
content: The 2025-26 NBA season kicks off October 21st with the reigning champion Oklahoma City Thunder hosting the Houston Rockets.  The Rockets, bolstered by two-time champion Kevin Durant, aim to impress.  Fans can catch the action on various networks and streaming platforms.  Expect a strong showing from both teams as they begin their championship quests.

title: Asia Cup row: Pak's Naqvi declines to hand over trophy again; BCCI to move ICC
content: India's Asia Cup victory remains marred by a trophy dispute, with ACC head Mohsin Naqvi refusing to release it to the BCCI. Despite requests from India, Afghanistan, and Sri Lanka, Naqvi insists on a BCCI representative collecting it from Dubai. The BCCI has rejected this, planning to raise the issue at an upcoming ICC meeting.

title: Govardhan Puja 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages and quotes for loved ones
content: Govardhan Puja 2025 is approaching, a festival celebrating Lord Krishna's protection of Vrindavan. Devotees prepare to share heartfelt wishes and messages. The article offers 100+ wishes, messages, and quotes for family, friends, and colleagues. It also provides tips on celebrating this auspicious day, including worship of Govardhan Hill and offering Annakut. This festival emphasizes devotion, humility, and gratitude.

title: Is Iran going nuclear again? Satellite images show rebuilt Taleghan-2 - what is it?
content: New satellite imagery reveals Iran is rebuilding Taleghan 2, a former nuclear weapons development site at Parchin, following its destruction in an October 2024 Israeli air strike. Construction resumed in May 2025, with a new structure emerging by August. This rebuilding escalates tensions and renews debate over diplomatic efforts to curb Iran's nuclear ambitions.

title: Stephen Curry reveals hilarious nickname for sister Sydel on her 31st birthday
content: Amidst personal speculations, Stephen and Ayesha Curry celebrated Sydel Curry Lee's 31st birthday. Stephen affectionately revealed his sister's nickname, 'Flossy,' in a heartwarming Instagram post. Sydel, an influencer, also shared a reflective message about her new life chapter, expressing gratitude for her community and family as she embraces turning 31.

title: Marcio Rubio faces backlash for 'Hindu-less' Diwali greeting
content: US Secretary of State Marco Rubio's Diwali message on X has drawn criticism for omitting any mention of Hindus, the festival's core community. Critics argue this dilutes Diwali's Hindu origins and feels dismissive, despite the message wishing joy and peace to all celebrants. The omission overlooks the festival's deep religious and cultural significance for Hindus worldwide.

title: Indian Railways To Run 12,000 Special Trains For Chhath Festival Rush
content: Railways is operating more than 12,000 special trains countrywide to cater to the festive rush, a release said.

title: "My Rivals Can Go To Any Extent": Ex Punjab Top Cop On Dead Son's Video
content: Former Punjab Police chief Mohammed Mustafa has alleged a conspiracy behind what he called targeting of his family after the death of his 33-year-old son under mysterious circumstances.

title: Trump-Putin Summit Planned For Budapest Is On Hold: Report
content: US President Donald Trump's plan for a swift meeting with Russian leader Vladimir Putin is on hold, a US official said Tuesday, the latest twist in his stop-and-go effort to resolve the war in Ukraine.

title: Indian, Chinese Troops Exchange Diwali Sweets Along The Border
content: Spokesperson of the Chinese Embassy in India, Yu Jing, on Tuesday said that Indian and Chinese troops exchanged sweets on the occasion of Diwali.

title: Fill All Potholes In Bengaluru Within A Week: Siddaramaiah To Officials
content: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah on Tuesday ordered officials to fill all potholes in Bengaluru within a week, following his earlier directive last month that set October 31 as the deadline for repairs across the city's five corporation limits.

title: Cash, Liquor Worth Rs 71 Crore Seized In Dry Bihar Ahead Of Polls
content: Enforcement agencies have seized cash, drugs, liquor and precious metals worth over Rs 71 crore in Bihar since the announcement of the assembly polls, the Election Commission said on Tuesday.

title: Louvre Security Apparatus Worked During Heist, Says French Culture Minister
content: France's culture minister said Tuesday that the security apparatus installed at the Louvre worked properly during a dramatic weekend heist in which historic jewels were stolen from the world's most-visited museum.

title: UN Rights Work Facing "Existential Threat" Amid Budget Cuts: Report
content: United Nations rights work is being disproportionately targeted for cuts amid a deep UN funding crisis, posing an "existential threat" to vital investigations and accountability efforts, a report warned Tuesday.

title: London University Professor Deported From Delhi Airport Over Visa Violations
content: A professor associated with the School of Oriental and African Studies (SOAS) at the University of London was deported from the IGI Airport over alleged violation of visa conditions, sources said on Tuesday.

title: The Audacity Of Tejashwi Yadav's Ambition: Shifting From 'MY' To 'PDA'
content: In the intricate smorgasbord of Bihar's political landscape, the Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) has long stood as a formidable player, its roots entrenched in the soil of the Muslim-Yadav coalition.

title: "Foreign Terrorists Big Challenge": Jammu Sees 120 Anti-Terror Ops Every Day
content: Around 120 anti-terrorist operations are in progress each day in Jammu region, underscoring the terror threat and security challenges in a region that was free from terrorism until a few years ago.

title: JD Vance Reaches Israel, Says Gaza Ceasefire Going Better Than Expected
content: US Vice President JD Vance and other envoys projected optimism Tuesday about Gaza 's fragile ceasefire agreement, calling progress better than anticipated as they visited a new centre in Israel for civilian and military cooperation.

title: Salute Their Courage: PM Modi Pays Tribute On Police Commemoration Day
content: Vice President C P Radhakrishnan, Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Union ministers Rajnath Singh and Amit Shah on Tuesday extended greetings on Police Commemoration Day, saying police personnel exemplify bravery and compassion.

title: Video: On Busy Lucknow Road, 3 Men Set Off Crackers From Roof Of Moving Car
content: As India celebrated Diwali on Monday, multiple videos of people performing risky firecracker stunts surfaced online.

title: Pastor Among 3 Arrested In UP For Alleged Illegal Religious Conversions
content: Three persons, including a pastor, have been arrested for allegedly luring poor and underprivileged Hindus to convert to Christianity, officials said on Tuesday.

title: After Announcement During Minister's Visit, India Upgrades Kabul Mission
content: India on Tuesday announced upgrading its technical mission in Kabul to the status of an embassy as part of broader efforts to deepen its bilateral engagement with Kabul.

title: Capitol Rioter Pardoned By Trump Charged With Threatening Democratic Leader
content: A Jan. 6 rioter pardoned by US President Donald Trump has been charged with threatening to kill House of Representatives Democratic leader Hakeem Jeffries, according to a court document.

title: Man Stabbed To Death On Diwali Night After Bike Collision In Madhya Pradesh
content: A 35-year-old man was stabbed to death following a dispute over a bike collision in Madhya Pradesh's Ujjain.

title: Video: UP Villagers Throw Stones At Police Van, Shatter Windows, Injure Cops
content: Upset at a case not being registered against an alleged murderer, villagers surrounded a police van in Uttar Pradesh's Gorakhpur, threw stones at it and attacked it with sticks.

title: Hit By Heavy Rain, Tamil Nadu Readies Shelters, Braces For Possible Cyclone
content: Several districts across Tamil Nadu are preparing rescue and relief plans as the northeast monsoon intensifies amid an early onset, officials said. There is a possibility of a cyclone developing, the weather office said.

title: Kochi Corporation shares State govt‚Äôs development and welfare-oriented vision, says CM
content: Chief Minister highlights Kochi Corporation‚Äôs development initiatives; says the govt. is undertaking several projects for the comprehensive development of the city

title: High Court notice on plea for Ajmer dargah panel, challenge to CCTV cameras
content: Respondents were asked to explain financial irregularities flagged in CAG reports and the absence of Dargah Committee for the last three years

title: Gang of four arrested for looting shop
content: Following a theft case, the Sadashivanagar police arrested a gang of four for allegedly stealing cash and valuables from a shop

title: Deepavali fireworks worsen Delhi‚Äôs air quality
content: 16 cities record ‚Äòvery poor‚Äô air quality; pollution readings point to violation of SC norms on use of green firecrackers; Dharuhera in Haryana records worst air quality nationally

title: J&K Police kept tricolour flying high even at cost of their own life: L-G Manoj Sinha
content: In Jammu, Inspector General of Police (IGP) Bhim Sen Tuti said security forces were carrying out around 120 anti-terrorist operations to ward off terror attacks

title: Pollution levels went up after Chennai celebrated¬†Deepavali
content: Besant Nagar, with an air quality index of 190, was the cleanest¬†and¬†Valasarawakkam¬†came in last with an¬†AQI¬†of 332, according to data released by the Tamil Nadu Pollution Control Board

title: Mahagatbandhan fields 253 candidates for 243 seats in Bihar
content: Congress candidates face off against the RJD in five seats and against the CPI in another four; fingers are being pointed at the RJD for stretching the negotiations down to the wire

title: T.N. government must expedite paddy procurement, says Anbumani
content: In a statement, he said around 70% of the 6.13 lakh acres of paddy fields was harvested but only 40% of the harvest had been procured so far

title: Tamil Nadu government reiterates purchase preference for SC/ST-owned firms while floating tenders
content: The State government had enabled the mandatory purchase preference for enterprises owned by entrepreneurs from SC and ST communities under certain provisions of the Tamil Nadu Transparency in Tenders Act, 1998, and Rules, 2000

title: U.P. CM announces age relaxation, reservation for Agniveers in police
content: Agniveers retiring in 2026 and beyond will receive an age relaxation and horizontal reservation, on par with ex-servicemen, in direct recruitment to the ranks of Constable, Mounted Constable, and Fireman

title: Nitish sparks row on first day of his campaign as he rebukes Sanjay Jha
content: Mr. Jha was trying to prevent the Bihar CM from garlanding BJP candidate Rama Nishad; RJD mocks Mr. Kumar‚Äôs actions; Opposition VIP candidate‚Äôs nomination rejected in Sugauli constituency

title: Foreign carriers ‚Äòpoaching‚Äô Indian pilots would be disturbing: Elbers
content: India sought a UN code of conduct to curb the migration of its aviation professionals; the proposal failed, with ICAO emphasising on the need to improve retention and collaboration

title: India-Japan ties are vital for Indo-Pacific peace, says Modi as he congratulates new Japan PM
content: Sanae Takaichi, elected as first woman PM in Japan, is known for hard-line views on China, militaristic foreign policy

title: Two stab to death old man in Chhattisgarh over bursting firecrackers
content: The incident happened following a heated argument over bursting firecrackers outside the victim‚Äôs house in Durg district

title: Vizag is poised to turn into an AI hub, says BJP Andhra Pradesh chief Madhav
content: Thanking Prime Minister Modi for making the Vizag Google project possible, he says it will attract huge investments, create employment and shape India‚Äôs digital future

title: FATF may discuss state sponsorship of terrorism, Pakistan entities in focus
content: Indian security agencies have gathered inputs showing that the LeT, under the front of Jamaat-ud-Dawa, has raised funds through online and offline campaigns to rebuild its headquarters in Muridke

title: Couple arrested for ‚Äòtorturing‚Äô children
content: Wounds were found on the children‚Äôs hands, legs, and other body parts. They were sent to the Government General Hospital (GGH) in Vijayawada for medical examination, says District Child Protection Officer

title: TTD mulls season-wise SOPs to enhance safety of pilgrims
content: To minimise inconvenience during monsoon showers, the officials have been directed to reduce SSD tokens, ensure effective use of covered queue systems, and serve¬†annaprasadam on time

title: Yogi Vemana University sets sights on global excellence
content: New Vice-Chancellor  rolls out strategic plan emphasising skill development, industry collaboration, and emerging tech programmes as YVU achieves top NAAC grade and major research funding

title: Lok Sabha Speaker appoints advocate to assist panel probing Justice Yashwant Varma
content: Advocate Karan Umesh Salvi to serve as consultant to committee investigating corruption charges against Allahabad HC judge

title: Heavy rains dampen Deepavali spirit across South Coastal Andhra
content: Incessant downpour leaves festive markets deserted and vendors counting losses; authorities in coastal districts issue alerts and precautionary measures

title: London Book of Records defends recognition of Karnataka‚Äôs Shakti scheme and KSRTC
content: A statement by the company says there is no question of anything dubious, suspicious, or issues of a dissolved company, while adding that all contact details are available on the official website

title: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu orders swift probe, harsh punishment in Kandukur murder case
content: The Chief Minister announces a comprehensive compensation package for the next of kin of the deceased, orders that the case be tried in a fast-track court

title: India upgrades Technical Mission in Kabul to embassy with ‚Äòimmediate effect‚Äô
content: Development comes days after visit by Taliban administration‚Äôs acting Foreign Minister Amir Khan Muttaqi

title: Security breaches at women‚Äôs hostels in Kerala call for safety audit
content: While a man allegedly sexually assaulted a techie woman at a hostel room in Thiruvananthapuram on Sunday, a youth was nabbed in Kannur for reportedly trespassing into a women‚Äôs hostel at Thavakara in Kannur the next day

title: Tirupati district on high alert as heavy rains loom
content: Control rooms in Tirupati and Gudur activated; Collector directs officials to monitor low-lying areas, ensure relief readiness, and guide farmers to protect crops and livestock

title: Allahabad HC directs SP Bahraich to probe case of minors booked for rioting
content: Court asks Superintendent of Police to act against erring officials if false implication of children is confirmed

title: Gitanjali Angmo‚Äôs ‚Äòsurveillance‚Äô raises question on personal freedoms of NSA detainee‚Äôs family members
content: Sonam Wangchuk‚Äôs wife told the Supreme Court that she was accompanied by security personnel, her meetings supervised, not allowed to meet anyone in Jodhpur and was ‚Äòtaken‚Äô to the railway station, ‚Äòconstantly‚Äô surveilled in Delhi, among other infringements of her ‚Äòfundamental rights as a free citizen of India‚Äô

title: One toilet for 120 tribal girls living in Thirunelli Ashram School
content: Students have been facing a harrowing time ever since the girls‚Äô hostel was declared unsafe in July this year, and they are now living in three classrooms

title: Government asks utilities to carry out maintenance after CEA detects failure in 75 EHV transmission towers
content: These assets are owned by 12 players, including Adani Transmission, ReNew Transmission Ventures, Resonia Limited (erstwhile Sterlite Power Transmission Ltd), Powergrid and NTPC, said the report

title: Tribal trio revives baby monkey, wins hearts in act of compassion in Thiruvananthapuram
content: Udaya, Sachithra and Saugandhika, members of the Ponmudi Vanasamrakshana Samiti, administered CPR on the monkey by performing chest compressions after it crashed on to tarred road, unconscious and suffering a wound to its forehead  due to electrocution

title: Seven new dialysis centres to come up in Andhra Pradesh
content: Being set up as part of the Pradhan Mantri National Dialysis Programme, these centres will obviate the need for people to travel long distances to reach a hospital for treatment, says Health Minister Satya Kumar Yadav

title: Traffic diversions announced for Sadar Utsav at Narayanguda
content: The event will be held from 7 p.m. on Wednesday to 4 a.m. on Thursday at YMCA; visitors attending the Utsav can park their vehicles at Keshav Memorial College grounds

title: Chief Minister inaugurates new Palayam market in Kozhikode
content: A section of the vendors at the old market stage protest, expressing their unwillingness to move to the new facility

title: State making strong interventions in sports sector: Balagopal
content: Minister inaugurates 67th Kerala School Sports Meet. Footballer I.M. Vijayan and Minister V. Sivankutty light ceremonial torch

title: BJP-JD(S) to form coordination panels separately for GBA area and rest of Karnataka
content: With elections to the Greater Bengaluru Authority on the horizon, the BJP-JD(S) coalition partners have decided to set up separate coordination committees for the GBA region and Karnataka for effectively tackling the government over various issues.

title: ‚ÄòTicket for kin‚Äô: despite protests, Bihar parties yield to dynastic pressure
content: Though top leaders like Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar are speaking up against dynasty politics and the danger it poses for democracy, the importance of family connections in electoral politics has not diminished in the latest Assembly polls

title: Lokesh explores opportunities in seafood exports, agri-tech, and innovation partnerships in Australia
content: On the third day of his visit, the Andhra Pradesh IT Minister urges Seafood Industry Australia to facilitate trade missions and buyer-seller networking

title: Minister, officials pay tributes to police martyrs
content: On Police Commemoration Day, Kollu Ravindra, district authorities, and police officers across Krishna, Vijayawada, and Eluru honour officers who sacrificed their lives in the line of duty

title: Konaseema fireworks explosion: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu announces ‚Çπ15 Lakh ex gratia to each of the victims‚Äô kin
content: Ten persons, including its owner, were killed in the accident, and six of them were women; the Chief Minister instructs officials to invoke PD Act and initiate strict legal action against those flouting norms

title: Kumily witnesses 18 landslips on Saturday

title: Woman doctor assaulted in West Bengal¬†government hospital, two held

title: Uttar Pradesh Congress asks district units adjoining Bihar to help INDIA bloc candidates

title: NHL rink report: Matthew Schaefer's hot start, Tusky's debut, games of the week
content: no. 1 draft pick has had quite the debut in the NHL, hasn't he? he started his NHL career with a five-game point streak (and counting) that's the second-longest point streak by any defenseman from the start of their career .

title: Sources: Angels to hire Kurt Suzuki as manager
content: the 42-year-old spent 16 years playing for five franchises and won the 2019 World Series with the Washington Nationals . former angels stars Albert Pujols and Torii Hunter were also in consideration for the job to replace Ron Washington, who missed nearly half the 2025 season after undergoing quadruple bypass surgery .

title: MMA divisional rankings: How did Brendan Allen upsetting Reinier de Ridder shake things up?
content: reinier de Ridder is now ahead of the top-ranked middleweight . he's the only other weight class with changes in these rankings is heavyweight, because Francis Ngannou has not fought in just over a year and was removed as ineligible .

title: Businessman‚Äôs son arrested for Jaguar hit-and-run that left 1 dead, 5 injured in UP
content: When not covering crime, he reads fiction, roams around the dark alleys of the city in the dead of night. An MA (English Litt) from University of Lucknow, Pathikrit loves to speak French, well at least a smattering of it. He did his graduation in French language. A recipient of the Road Safety Fellowship of the United Nations, Pathikrit drives cautiously and advises others to do that too. Read More

title: US visa chaos: New norms offer relief - who is exempt from paying $100k fee?
content: Lubna Kably is a senior editor, who focuses on various policies and legislation. In particular, she writes extensively on immigration and tax policies. The Indian diaspora is the largest in the world; through her articles she demystifies the immigration-policy related developments in select countries for outbound students, job aspirants and employees. She also analyses the impact of Income-tax and GST related developments for individuals and business entities. Read More
